institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 11 (Selection of support recipients)
contents: Article 11 (Selection of support recipients) ① The chairman of the board shall form a selection review committee in accordance with Article 4 of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations and select supporting companies according to the screening criteria. The requirements and selection criteria for support recipients are set forth in the annual Ministry of Employment and Labor business plan. The Chairman of the Board shall determine separately, reflecting the results of approval., ② The Selection Review Committee shall select companies that meet the following requirements as support companies., 1. An implementation plan for learning organization has been established through consultation with employee representatives by the date of application for support. 2. Learning group activities must be included in learning organization measures and support. However, cases where study groups are being introduced as of the date of application for support are excluded; 3. Subscribed to employment insurance and are not in arrears of insurance premiums; 4. Similar/overlapping with study organization support projects from the national and local governments during the support period 5. Requirements and selection criteria for other support targets reflect the results of business plan approval by the Ministry of Employment and Labor every year.
